name: Affan Qureshi
body:
### INTRODUCTION.
Hello everyone!
I am Affan Qureshi belongs to Pakistan punjab. I am done Mcs (Master in computer Science) from The Islamia University Bahawalpur and I started my job career by joining Ufone Telecommunication Company as Customer Care  Exective and my aim is to become a good developer on RoR so that i started internship in Evercam.io to achieve my aims.

### PURPOSE
The purpose of creating this page is to share and update the progress on daily or weekly basis.  

### CONTACT
you can contact with me through:
affan_ani (skype)
affan.qureshi11@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
